entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:36 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
